
```{r}
# Install (if needed) and load the package
#install.packages("apaTables", dependencies = TRUE)
library(apaTables)
```

```{r}
# Example using built‑in dataset ‘viagra’
data(viagra) 

table1 <- apa.1way.table(
  iv = dose, dv = libido,
  data = viagra,
  table.number = 1,
  show.conf.interval = TRUE
)

table1
```


```{r}
data(attitude) # built-in dataset
tableCor <- apa.cor.table(attitude, table.number = 3)
tableCor
```



```{r}
data(album)
m1 <- lm(sales ~ adverts + airplay, data = album)
tableReg1 <- apa.reg.table(m1, table.number = 4)
tableReg1
```

```{r}
blkA <- lm(sales ~ adverts + airplay, data = album)
blkB <- lm(sales ~ adverts + airplay + I(adverts * airplay), data = album)
tableInt <- apa.reg.table(blkA, blkB, table.number = 6)
tableInt
```
